page.title: 07BEAFORD SCHOOL SPORTS DAY
page.content: On Wednesday 19th. June it was our sports day. The first event was the 80m sprint which Lorelie won. Every sports day we do an obstacle race. This year we had to match cards; crawl under a net; undo a knotted skipping rope; score a goal at the netball post; roll a ball 20m using a shinty stick; then finish off carrying an egg in a spoon. I was third in this race. It was a nice afternoon, not too hot, just right. Another of my events was the relay race. There were four children in each team, and our team won. Other races were skipping, sack, bean bag, egg and spoon, and mini-marathon races. Every child took part in at least 2 events. I did 5 events, although I had a cold and cough so that held me back a bit. In a fortnight 5 other schools join us in the Area Schools Sports.
